content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely plan to visit some of the wine cellars and try a traditional Porto-style lunch. By the way, I've been thinking about my travel budget and I realized that I tend to splurge more when I'm traveling with family, whereas when I'm solo, I'm more mindful of my expenses. I think that's one of the benefits of solo travel - you have more control over your budget and can make more spontaneous decisions.
